events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but I want to return the item and get a refund since it doesn't meet my expectations.
The reported case was identified as a refund request based on customer mention of return and refund.
The refund specialist agent was assigned to handle the case and assist the customer with the return process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order and request a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and reason for return so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product didn’t fit the description on the website.
Thank you for the information. You can return the product within 14 days. Once we receive it, the refund will be processed to your original payment method.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick help! I will send it back tomorrow.
We have received your returned product and completed the refund to your account. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Since we haven't heard otherwise, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support and we wish you a great day.
